name: Death Dress
description:
-Death Dress- Chapter 1:

Don't you think your life is too boring? Do you want something to spice up your days? Yeah, I don't think you would like that once a weird doll appears in your life with a humble request:

"bring me skin...

...Or I'll take yours"

Solve mysteries, find hot spirits in your area and deal with the most annoying co-workers of the city, all while dressed up fabulously in this stock-image-filled visual novel!

Key Features:
  • Click On Stuff! Yeah this happen once and never again because the engine explodes. Wohooo!
  • Intense Characters! You might want to punch all of them (affectionate)
  • TWO CATS!!! And maybe more in the future! who knows?!
  • Pretty Costumes! If only one dress is not enough, wait until you see all your friends!

If you haven't noticed so far (I don't blame you, don't worry lol) This is a parody of the Spirit Hunter series: Death Mark and NG. In other words, don't take it too seriously.

Death Dress is made just for fun by the Spirit Hunter Community ♥

-CHAPTER 2 COMING SOON!!!-

If you enjoyed the game, please support me on Ko-Fi!
